en.haventScannedAllSides: Oops, you did not scan in all 6 sides correctly
en.cubeAlreadySolved: Your cube has already been solved
en.startingPosition:
Starting position: 
Front: Green
Top: White
Note:
It's very important how you hold the cube,
otherwise you'll have to scan it again.

solveManual.R: Turn the right side once away from you.
solveManual.R': Turn the right side once towards you.
solveManual.L: Turn the left side once towards you.
solveManual.L': Turn the left side once away from you.
solveManual.D: Turn the bottom layer once to the right.
solveManual.D': Turn the bottom layer once to the left.
solveManual.B: Turn the back side once to the left.
solveManual.B': Turn the back side once to the right.
solveManual.F: Turn the front side once to the right.
solveManual.F': Turn the front side once to the left.
